attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
can someone tell me why it is classed as legally acceptable to entice and sell something to the public which causes fatal diseases?
i'm refering to cigarettes which has caused the death of many all for the sake of money.
there is surely something seriously wrong with government to give its approval of such a thing.
i think cigarettes should be banned completely because the use of sale of them serves no good purpose.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
